mosinstall.name: JoomSearch
mosinstall.author: José Balça
mosinstall.description: Search anything in differents sites using Google AJAX search API. IMPORTANT: To use this module you need to get a key from google, you can get it here [http://code.google.com/apis/ajaxsearch/]

param.name: web
param.label: Search the Web
param.description: Select whether to search the web or only in the mentioned sites

param.name: width
param.label: Width of the module
param.description: Choose the best witdth to the module, so that it can fit well in your site

param.name: url
param.label: URL
param.description: URLs of the differents sites that will be used during the search
